references: Repealing: Ord 16397, Ord 16528, Ord 28324, Ord 29060, Ord 33317, Ord 36129
summary: An ordinance relating to fire and explosion hazards; regulating the construction, maintenance, equipment and use of structures, the use of premises and things and the conduct of persons; defining the powers and duties of certain City officers and employees; and repealing Ordinances Nos. 16397, 16528, 28324, 29060, 33317 and 36129.
